components.name: GqJNNZ
components.content:
We need to ask some questions to check you can apply for this funding.

We'll ask about:

  • your organisation’s location and type
  • the location of the vacant property
  • how long the property has been vacant
  • the vacancy rate of the high street
  • when you expect us to defray your costs

pages.title: Are you applying from a local authority in England?

components.name: lHTLBl
components.title: Are you applying from a local authority in England?

pages.title: Why are you applying for this grant?

components.name: OjGBLs
components.title: Why are you applying for this grant?

pages.title: In the last 2 years, has the property been vacant for 365 days or more?

components.name: pPNbfh
components.title: In the last 2 years, has the property been vacant for 365 days or more?

pages.title: You cannot apply for this funding

components.name: oAnaAw
components.content:
Based on your answer, you’re not eligible to apply for funding to cover the cost of delivering a high street rental auction.

The property must have been vacant for 365 days or more in the last 2 years.

Check who can apply in the High Street Rental Auctions Fund prospectus

pages.title: Is the vacancy rate in the designated high street or town centre 8% or higher?

components.name: Mhzypt
components.title: Is the vacancy rate in the designated high street or town centre 8% or higher?

pages.title: You cannot apply for this funding

components.name: LpLRZy
components.content:
Based on your answer, you’re not eligible to apply for funding to cover the cost of delivering a high street rental auction.

The property must be in a designated high street with a vacancy rate of 8% or higher.

Check who can apply in the High Street Rental Auctions Fund prospectus

pages.title: You cannot apply for this funding

components.name: LNXmKd
components.content:
Based on your answer, you’re not eligible to apply for funding to cover the cost of delivering a high street rental auction.

We must defray all costs by 31 March 2025.

Check who can apply in the High Street Rental Auctions Fund prospectus

pages.title: You cannot apply for this funding

components.name: GuqDsJ
components.content:
Based on your answer, you’re not eligible to apply for funding to cover the cost of delivering a high street rental auction.

You must be applying from local authority in England.

Check who can apply in the High Street Rental Auctions Fund prospectus
